tasks.title: Setup Databricks Python Notebook Environment
tasks.description: Create and configure a Databricks notebook environment that can be shared with the Product team for TinyTroupe simulations.
tasks.details:
- Create a basic Databricks notebook template.
- Configure Python environment with necessary dependencies.
- Add authentication and access controls for sharing with the Product team.
- Document the setup process for future reference.

subtasks.title: Create Databricks Workspace
subtasks.description: Set up a new Databricks workspace or configure an existing one for TinyTroupe simulations.
subtasks.details:
- Create a new Databricks workspace if needed
- Configure workspace settings for optimal performance
- Ensure proper access controls for team members

subtasks.title: Set Up Python Environment
subtasks.description: Configure the Python environment with all necessary dependencies for TinyTroupe.
subtasks.details:
- Install required Python packages
- Configure environment variables
- Set up connection to TinyTroupe library
- Test environment with basic imports

subtasks.title: Create Template Notebook
subtasks.description: Develop a template notebook that serves as the foundation for running TinyTroupe simulations.
subtasks.details:
- Create notebook structure with sections for setup, simulation, and results
- Add helper functions for common operations
- Include documentation within the notebook
- Test the notebook with a simple scenario

subtasks.title: Configure Sharing and Collaboration
subtasks.description: Set up sharing and collaboration features to make the notebook accessible to the Product team.
subtasks.details:
- Configure access permissions for team members
- Set up version control for notebooks
- Enable collaboration features
- Test sharing with a team member

tasks.title: Implement TinyTroupe Integration for Databricks
tasks.description: Create the necessary code to integrate TinyTroupe library within the Databricks environment.
tasks.details:
- Import and initialize TinyTroupe library in Databricks.
- Set up configuration files for TinyTroupe integration.
- Test basic TinyTroupe functionalities in Databricks environment.
- Document any integration challenges and solutions.

tasks.title: Prepare TinyTroupe Notebook Templates
tasks.description: Create notebook templates with example TinyTroupe prompts that Product team can directly edit and run.
tasks.details:
- Provide clear notebook structure with documentation.
- Include example TinyTroupe prompts that can be easily modified.
- Add guidance comments within code cells.
- Create templates for different simulation scenarios.

subtasks.title: Create Basic TinyTroupe Notebook Structure
subtasks.description: Develop a well-organized notebook structure with clear sections for documentation, setup, prompt editing, and results.
subtasks.details:
- Create markdown cells with clear instructions
- Add code cells for imports and initialization
- Include well-commented prompt cells
- Add results processing and visualization sections
- Document workflow through the notebook

subtasks.title: Develop Example Prompts for Different Use Cases
subtasks.description: Create example TinyTroupe prompts for various simulation scenarios that product team can modify.
subtasks.details:
- Create advertisement evaluation prompt examples
- Develop product testing prompt examples
- Add focus group simulation prompt examples
- Include market research prompt examples
- Create brainstorming session prompt examples

subtasks.title: Add Inline Documentation and Tips
subtasks.description: Provide extensive inline comments and tips to guide the product team in writing effective TinyTroupe prompts.
subtasks.details:
- Add documentation on prompt structure
- Include tips for effective prompt engineering
- Provide warnings about common pitfalls
- Add examples of good vs. poor prompts
- Include troubleshooting guidance

subtasks.title: Create Helper Functions for Prompt Execution
subtasks.description: Develop simple helper functions to make prompt execution and results handling easier for the product team.
subtasks.details:
- Create function for running TinyTroupe prompts
- Develop error handling utilities
- Add functions for formatting and displaying results
- Include functions for saving results
- Create simple debugging helpers

tasks.title: Document Databricks Image Upload Feature Usage
tasks.description: Create documentation and examples for using Databricks' built-in image upload feature with TinyTroupe simulations.
tasks.details:
- Document how to use Databricks' built-in image upload feature.
- Create examples of associating uploaded images with TinyTroupe simulations.
- Add helper functions for working with uploaded images.
- Demonstrate proper image referencing in notebooks.

tasks.title: Develop Visual Reporting Feature
tasks.description: Create visual reports for simulation outputs that can be viewed within Databricks notebooks.
tasks.details:
- Design report templates and layouts.
- Implement data processing for simulation outputs.
- Create visualization components (charts, graphs, tables).
- Ensure reports are interactive and exportable.

tasks.title: Develop Example Simulation Scenarios
tasks.description: Create example scenarios showcasing TinyTroupe capabilities for different use cases mentioned in the PRD.
tasks.details:
- Develop advertisement evaluation scenario.
- Implement software testing simulation example.
- Create synthetic data generation example.
- Build product feedback simulation.
- Design brainstorming simulation for focus groups.

tasks.title: Documentation and User Guide
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guide for the Product team.
tasks.details:
- Write setup instructions for new users.
- Create tutorials for common use cases.
- Document all features and functionalities.
- Provide troubleshooting guide and FAQs.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Perform thorough testing of the entire simulation environment.
tasks.details:
- Test all features for functionality.
- Validate integration with Databricks.
- Perform load testing with complex scenarios.
- Verify security measures for data privacy.

tasks.title: Training Materials for Product Team
tasks.description: Develop training materials to help the Product team understand and use the simulation environment effectively.
tasks.details:
- Create video tutorials.
- Develop hands-on exercises.
- Write step-by-step guides for common scenarios.
- Prepare Q&A session materials.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the simulation environment for better performance within Databricks.
tasks.details:
- Identify and address performance bottlenecks.
- Implement caching mechanisms where appropriate.
- Optimize code for parallel execution.
- Reduce resource utilization for large simulations.

master.description: Main task list for TinyTroupe Databricks Integration
